name: @edenapp/sdk
description: Eden Desktop Environment SDK - Build Electron-based desktop environments with modular app support

scripts.build: pnpm run tokens:build && pnpm run css:build && pnpm run codegen && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run bundle:app-frame && pnpm run bundle:app-runtime && pnpm run build:apps && pnpm run copy-assets
scripts.css:build: npx lightningcss --bundle --minify --targets 'chrome 132' edencss/eden.css -o dist/edencss/eden.css && npx lightningcss --bundle --minify --targets 'chrome 132' edencss/tokens.css -o dist/edencss/eden-tokens.css
scripts.tokens:build: cd edencss && npx style-dictionary build --config style-dictionary.config.mjs

author: Dariusz Majnert
